author: Staff Reporter
text: Kanyakumari District Rail Users’ Association has appealed to Union Minister Pon Radhakrishnan to take initiative to extend Train No. 22627/22628 Tiruchi-Tirunelveli Intercity Express to Nagercoil or Thiruvananthapuram. The rakes of 16341/16342 Guruvayur-Thiruvananthapuram express lying idle from 10.10 to 17.30 hrs could be used to operate a train service between Thiruvananthapuram and Tiruchi without change in the present timings, the forum said.
title: Extend train service: forum
